verses.roman:
śrīvāsa-paṇḍite prabhu kari' āliṅgana
kaṇṭhe dhari' kahe tāṅre madhura vacana

synonyms: śrīvāsa-paṇḍite—unto Śrīvāsa Paṇḍita; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kari'-doing; āliṅgana—embracing; kaṇṭhe dhari'-catching his neck; kahe—says; tāṅre—unto him; madhura vacana—sweet words.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then embraced Śrīvāsa Paṇḍita and, with His arm about his neck, began to speak to him in sweet words.
